name: Star Fighter (itch) (zyenapz)
description:
Star Fighter is a shoot 'em up game with a retro space theme! You take control of a blue star fighter and make battle with three enemies:

 The Hellfighter
Shoots fiery lasers at the player.The Raider
A spider-like creature who dashes through the
battlefield. The Fatty
A fat hellish glob who shoots bouncing fireballs!
Very formidable.

Your goal is to collect as many gold coins as you can, and to survive as long as possible! Pick up upgrades like the health pickup and the gun pickup to help you survive longer!

The controls in-game are:

WASD - movement controls
Space - fire laser
Esc or P - pause the game
